name: As Per My Last Email
description:
A more-than-slightly absurd and short shooter about repairing your CEO's coffee cup. Don't think about it too much. We weren't able to find one of those red "DRAFT" stamps at the shops, but if we had, we would put it on everything in this game.

Made for the 2020 Global Game Jam, with the theme "repair".  Source files are over on their site.

WASD to move, left mouse button to shoot.

Created by:

Scott Schultz (Kallavan): Concept, programming, general absurdity

Celine Oon (Stellalune): Art, writing, soul-draining elevator music-making, administrative hell
